Restricted to finance majors. These certificates do not require additional hours beyond the finance major program. They are intended to allow students to develop specializations in areas of interest. Certificates will be awarded at only at the time of degree completion.
Certificate Admission Requirements
None
Certificate Requirements
No course grade lower than a C will be accepted for the certificate requirements, and the average GPA for the four courses must be 3.0 or higher.
An internship must be a paid internship with a financial services firm, and must be approved by the Finance Department Internship coordinator.
Prerequisite Courses
None
